title: User Registration with Valid Email and Password
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register using a valid email and strong password.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Input a valid email address and a strong password
Submit the registration form
Check that registration is successful and user is redirected to authenticated area or login page

title: User Registration with Invalid Email Format
description: Verify that the system correctly rejects registration attempts with invalid email formats and displays an appropriate error.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Input an invalid email format and a valid password
Submit the registration form
Verify that registration is rejected and an error message regarding invalid email format is displayed

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that users can log in successfully using correct email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter a registered email address and correct password
Click the login button
Check that user is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard or home page

title: User Login with Incorrect Password
description: Verify login fails with an incorrect password and an appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter a valid registered email address and an incorrect password
Click the login button
Verify that login is rejected and an error message about invalid credentials is displayed

title: User Login via Google OAuth
description: Verify users can authenticate successfully using Google OAuth integration.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Click the 'Login with Google' OAuth button
Complete OAuth flow with Google account
Verify user is authenticated, JWT tokens are issued, and redirected to the authenticated area

title: Session Persistence After Login
description: Verify that the user's session persists after closing and reopening the browser until explicit logout.

steps.description: Log in successfully with valid credentials
Close the browser window
Reopen the browser and navigate to an authenticated route
Check that the user remains logged in and has access without needing to log in again

title: Logout Functionality
description: Verify that logging out clears the session and redirects user to the public landing page.

steps.description: Log in successfully
Click the logout button or link
Check that the user session is cleared and the user is redirected to the landing page

title: Access Protected Route Without Authentication
description: Verify that unauthenticated users are redirected to login page when accessing protected routes.

steps.description: Navigate directly to a protected route such as user dashboard or booking management
Confirm redirection to the login page

title: Hotel Search with Valid Filters
description: Validate that searching hotels by name and location filters returns accurate matched results promptly.

steps.description: Navigate to hotels browsing page
Input a valid hotel name or location in the search/filter fields
Trigger the search action
Verify the results accurately reflect hotels matching search criteria with real-time load indications

title: Hotel Search with No Matching Results
description: Verify the system gracefully handles searches that yield no matching hotels.

steps.description: Search with a random or misspelled hotel name unlikely to match any records
Verify the display of appropriate 'no results found' message and no errors occur

title: View Hotel Details Including Amenities and Ratings
description: Verify the hotel detailed view shows all relevant amenities, ratings, and other information correctly.

steps.description: Select a hotel from the list
Navigate to the hotel's detail page
Check amenities, ratings, reviews, and hotel description are displayed accurately

title: Room Filtering by Date, Guest Count, and Room Type
description: Verify that the room list filters correctly based on user input for check-in and check-out dates, number of guests, and room type.

steps.description: Navigate to rooms browsing page
Select check-in and check-out dates using date picker
Input number of guests and select room type filters
Apply filters
Verify that rooms displayed match the filter criteria and show updated availability status

title: View Room Details with Dynamic Pricing Display
description: Ensure that room details page shows appropriate room information and dynamic pricing including weekend and holiday rates.

steps.description: Select a room from the filtered list
Open the room details page
Confirm room amenities, capacity, and price details including applicable dynamic pricing factors are correctly displayed

title: Complete Booking with Valid Guest Information and Date Availability
description: Test successful booking of a room with valid guest details where room is available for selected dates.

steps.description: Select available room and desired dates
Enter valid guest information in the booking form
Review price breakdown including dynamic pricing
Submit booking
Verify booking confirmation with unique reference code and updated availability

title: Booking Attempt with Unavailable Room Dates
description: Verify the system prevents booking of rooms unavailable on selected dates and displays appropriate feedback.

steps.description: Choose room with dates that have been booked previously or blocked
Attempt to complete booking with valid guest details
Verify booking is rejected with a clear message about unavailable dates and user cannot proceed

title: Booking Cancellation for Eligible Reservation
description: Verify user can cancel reservations that are eligible for cancellation and receives confirmation feedback.

steps.description: Navigate to user's bookings management page
Select a booking with status 'upcoming' or 'current' subject to cancellation policy
Click 'Cancel booking' and confirm action
Verify booking status updates to 'cancelled' and user sees a cancellation confirmation message

title: Booking Cancellation Attempt for Non-Cancellable Past Booking
description: Verify that cancellation option is disabled or blocked for past or already cancelled bookings.

steps.description: Navigate to bookings management page
Select a past booking or booking already marked cancelled
Ensure the cancellation action/button is disabled or not present and user is informed appropriately

title: Booking Management View Filtering by Status
description: Verify user can filter bookings by upcoming, current, past, and cancelled statuses and view updated lists.

steps.description: Navigate to bookings management page
Select each booking status filter option sequentially
Verify the booking list updates correctly matching the selected filter each time

title: Personal User Dashboard Displays Booking Statistics and Trends
description: Validate that dashboard loads and shows accurate booking counts, recent activity, and trend visualizations.

steps.description: Log in as a user with multiple bookings
Navigate to user dashboard page
Check that booking statistics, recent bookings list, and graphical trend charts render correctly and data is consistent

title: Responsive Layout and Theme Switching Consistency
description: Verify the main layout adapts properly across devices (desktop, tablet, mobile) and theme switching applies globally.

steps.description: Load the application on multiple screen sizes or simulate device sizes
Use the theme switcher to toggle between light and dark themes
Ensure layout is responsive with no UI breakage and theme colors apply consistently across all components

title: Real-time Data Updates on Booking Status Changes
description: Verify that changes, such as cancellation or new bookings, update relevant views in real-time via Supabase integration.

steps.description: Open booking management page in one browser session
Perform booking creation or cancellation from another session or user
Verify that the booking list updates in real-time without manual refresh

title: Form Validation on Guest Information During Booking
description: Verify that guest information forms enforce required fields and show validation errors for incorrect or missing data.

steps.description: Navigate to booking guest information form
Submit form with missing or invalid fields (e.g., empty name, invalid phone)
Verify validation errors are displayed appropriately and booking cannot proceed

title: Admin Dashboard Access Control
description: Verify that only users with admin roles can access the admin dashboard and others are redirected or shown error.

steps.description: Log in as a non-admin user
Attempt to navigate to the admin dashboard URL
Verify access is denied or user is redirected to forbidden or home page

title: Notifications System Displays Alerts Correctly
description: Verify that the main layout's notifications area displays alert messages consistently for booking actions and errors.

steps.description: Perform actions that trigger notifications (e.g., successful booking, cancellation, validation errors)
Verify notifications appear with correct messages and disappear as designed
